name: ThinkAhead
detailed_description: The concept of the game is to fill the board tiles using the knight chess piece. Levels start of simple, but become more complex leading up to the 10x10 board at the 60th level. Easy mode shows you the cells uoy can click on. It will help you to get uset to the gameplay. Minimalistic design and calm soundtrack will allow to concentrate at thinking ahead.
